verses.text: The \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* and the solitary \w place|strong="H6723"\w* shall be \w glad|strong="H7797"\w* for them; and the \w desert|strong="H6160"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w*, and \w blossom|strong="H6524"\w* as the \w rose|strong="H2261"\w*.

It shall \w blossom|strong="H6524"\w* \w abundantly|strong="H6524"\w*, and \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* even with \w joy|strong="H1525"\w* and \w singing|strong="H7444"\w*: the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* shall be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto it, the \w excellency|strong="H1926"\w* of \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w* and \w Sharon|strong="H8289"\w*, they shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add and\add* the \w excellency|strong="H1926"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
¶ \w Strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* ye the \w weak|strong="H7504"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w confirm|strong="H0553"\w* the \w feeble|strong="H3782"\w* \w knees|strong="H1290"\w*.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* to them \add that are\add* of a \w fearful|strong="H4116"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, Be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not: behold, your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \add with\add* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w*, \add even\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add with\add* a \w recompence|strong="H1576"\w*; he will \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w save|strong="H3467"\w* you.\f + \fr 35.4 \ft fearful: Heb. hasty\f*

Then the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* shall be \w opened|strong="H6491"\w*, and the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w* shall be \w unstopped|strong="H6605"\w*.

Then shall the \w lame|strong="H6455"\w* \add man\add* \w leap|strong="H1801"\w* as an \w hart|strong="H0354"\w*, and the \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* of the \w dumb|strong="H0483"\w* \w sing|strong="H7442"\w*: for in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* shall \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* break \w out|strong="H1234"\w*, and \w streams|strong="H5158"\w* in the \w desert|strong="H6160"\w*.

And the parched \w ground|strong="H8273"\w* shall become a \w pool|strong="H0098"\w*, and the thirsty \w land|strong="H6774"\w* \w springs|strong="H4002"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: in the \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w* of \w dragons|strong="H8577"\w*, where each \w lay|strong="H7258"\w*, \add shall be\add* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* with \w reeds|strong="H7070"\w* and \w rushes|strong="H1573"\w*.\f + \fr 35.7 \ft grass…: or, a court for reeds, etc\f*

And an \w highway|strong="H4547"\w* shall be there, and a \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and it shall be \w called|strong="H7121"\w* The \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*; the \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* shall not pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* it; but it \add shall be\add* for those: the wayfaring \w men|strong="H1980"\w*, though \w fools|strong="H0191"\w*, shall not \w err|strong="H8582"\w* \add therein\add*.\f + \fr 35.8 \ft but…: or, for he shall be with them\f*

No \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* shall be there, nor \add any\add* \w ravenous|strong="H6530"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* shall go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* thereon, it shall not be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* there; but the \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* shall \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \add there:\add*

And the \w ransomed|strong="H6299"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* with \w songs|strong="H7440"\w* and \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* upon their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*: they shall \w obtain|strong="H5381"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* and \w gladness|strong="H8342"\w*, and \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w* and \w sighing|strong="H0585"\w* shall flee \w away|strong="H5127"\w*.
